resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

If you wish to save recorded trajectories to your files select Save to Files option. To send data to the server enter your id below. Wait for WiFi option allows you to choose to only send data when connected to WiFi.

PathFinder is a tool meant to aid research in indoor positioning. The app collects data from the following sensors: Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Magnetometer, Barometer, Location, WiFi, Ambient Light, Proximity, Rotation and Activity data.\nThese data are used to trace your position as you walk around a building. The raw data and the path estimation are submitted to an online database. The path estimation is adjusted when starting and ending points are provided.
Set your location by placing a pin on the map.\nOnce set, add a pin in the direction you are facing.
